  1. net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes

Uses of Package
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes

Packages that use net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
Provides the different regimes for training
  • Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes used by net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
    Class
    Description
    BatchRegime
    A Regime implementation that performs full-batch training.
    ChainedRegime
    Composes and executes a chain of Regime decorators.
    ChainedRegime.BottomUpChainer
    Fluent builder that composes the chain from bottom up.
    ChainedRegime.Modifiable
    Abstract base for creating fluent builders of ChainedRegime.
    ChainedRegime.TopDownChainer
    Fluent builder that composes the chain from top down.
    DelegatedRegime
    An abstract Regime implementation that delegates all training to another Regime.
    MiniBatchRegime
    A Regime decorator that performs training using mini-batches.
    ObjectiveReportingRegime
    A Regime decorator that wraps another training regime and reports the objective (loss) value at each epoch.
    OnlineRegime
    A Regime decorator that performs online training (also known as stochastic training).
    StopIfNoImprovementRegime
    A Regime decorator that implements early stopping based on lack of improvement in the objective (loss).
